DescribeVideoTask.title: 查询视频审核任务的审核结果

ImageModeration.document: 例：同时调用色情识别、暴恐识别和政治敏感识别，返回结果均为成功。
ImageModeration.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: ticm.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ImageModeration
<公共请求参数>

{
    "ImageUrl": "https://xx/a.jpg",
    "Config": "",
    "Scenes": [
        "PORN",
        "POLITICS",
        "TERRORISM"
    ]
}
ImageModeration.title: 多个识别场景调用都成功

ImageModeration.document: 例：只调用其中的色情识别，返回结果为成功。
ImageModeration.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: ticm.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ImageModeration
<公共请求参数>

{
    "ImageUrl": "https://porn.jpg",
    "Config": "",
    "Scenes": [
        "PORN"
    ]
}
ImageModeration.title: 部分识别场景调用都成功

ImageModeration.document: 例：只调用其中的色情识别，返回结果为失败，Code 不为0。
ImageModeration.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: ticm.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ImageModeration
<公共请求参数>

{
    "ImageUrl": "https://porn.jpg",
    "Config": "",
    "Scenes": [
        "PORN"
    ]
}
ImageModeration.title: 部分识别场景调用失败

ImageModeration.document: 例：同时调用色情识别和暴恐识别，其中色情识别的结果为失败（Code非0），暴恐识别的结果为成功。
ImageModeration.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: ticm.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ImageModeration
<公共请求参数>

{
    "ImageUrl": "https://fack.jpg",
    "Config": "",
    "Scenes": [
        "PORN",
        "TERRORISM"
    ]
}
ImageModeration.title: 部分识别场景调用且部分成功

ImageModeration.document: 例：调用部分识别场景或者全部场景，由于下载等原因，导致整体结果失败。
ImageModeration.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: ticm.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ImageModeration
<公共请求参数>

{
    "ImageUrl": "https://error.jpg",
    "Config": "",
    "Scenes": [
        "PORN",
        "POLITICS",
        "TERRORISM"
    ]
}
ImageModeration.title: 整体结果失败

VideoModeration.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: ticm.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: VideoModeration
<公共请求参数>

{
    "VideoUrl": "https://test.mp4",
    "CBUrl": "http://callback.test.com",
    "DeveloperId": "123456",
    "Extra": "0001"
}
VideoModeration.title: 提交视频审核任务
